scripts.start: echo 'Start script can be called with out run between node and command. like npm start'
scripts.stop: echo 'stop script can be called with out run between node and command. like npm stop'
scripts.restart: echo 'restart script can be called with out run between node and command. like npm restart'
scripts.test: echo 'test script can be called with out run between node and command. like npm test'
